data.actual_result: When you tap on their name, it only highlights the username part, without the hashtag.
data.expected_result: When you tap on their name, it should highlight their username and hashtag.
data.short_description: Triple tapping someone's name (person must have nickname) won't highlight their full name. (Mac)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any discord server. - Locate a person who has a nickname in that server. - Press on their user so you get that small pop up to appear. - Triple tap their real username. - You will see that it won't highlight their full username so that you can copy it. It will only highlight their name, not the hashtag. - Do the same thing on a user without a nickname and you will see that it highlights their username and hashtag. - Observe the video.
